cause.description:
Due to the increasing Success of 9 to 5 Productions, The Jordan Michael Queen Foundation has been formed to give back to Michigan Communities. The foundation Focuses around Low Income Children and their families. The goal is very Broad, Whether its putting up a new playground for inner city youth, or providing food for familes in need, The Jordan Michael Queen Foundation wants to be involved in anyway possable to help bring the state of Michigan out of a state of depression. 9 to 5 Productions is dedicated to this cause and hopefully with your help we can make the dream a reality!
1. 9 to 5 productions is dedicated to support this cause and so should you. It is time to bring some light to the down and out people of Michigan!
cause.mission: Provide care and support for Low Income Children and their Families
cause.name: The Jordan Michael Queen Foundation
